meanings.definition: Adorned with a wreath or garland.
meanings.sent1: The chapleted statue in the park looked beautiful.
meanings.sent2: She wore a chapleted crown on her head during the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The chapleted dog pranced around happily in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The chapleted archway welcomed guests to the garden party.
meanings.sent5: The chapleted door of the cottage added a touch of elegance to the entrance.

meanings.sent1: The chapleted princess waved to the crowd from her carriage.
meanings.sent2: He felt proud wearing the chapleted medal around his neck.
meanings.sent3: The chapleted cat strutted around as if it owned the place.
meanings.sent4: The chapleted tree stood tall among the others in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The chapleted bride looked stunning in her wedding gown.

meanings.definition: Decorated with a chaplet or garland.
meanings.sent1: The chapleted doorway of the house was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent2: The chapleted table at the party was set with care.
meanings.sent3: The chapleted car drove through town turning heads.
meanings.sent4: The chapleted boat sailed gracefully on the lake.
meanings.sent5: The chapleted banner fluttered in the breeze at the festival.
